subject: BAD PERFORMANCE ON EXAMS!!
body:
Dear Rembo,
I have NOT seen YOU in SCHOOL for DAYS NOW!! WHERE HAVE YOU BEEN???? Your GRADES are SO LOW that a GOLDFISH seems to me SMARTER than YOU!!!! HOW can you FAIL this BADLY??? IF YOU do NOT study AND PASS THE NEXT exam that is NEXT WEEK, you will BANNED to OBLIVION!!!!

PS:- STOP playing video games and RUINING your mind WITH USELESS knowledge!!!

Regards,
- Mr. Graphite

subject: We need you on our team!
body:
Hey there Rembo!
We are looking for talented gamers to add to our roster for the upcoming tournament and WE WOULD LOVE TO HAVE YOU ON OUR TEAM!! We heard all about your pro gamer skills and would want to see it ourselves.
If you complete the 3 minigames that are.. by the way.. pretty hard for most people.. then you would be qualified to join us.
Can't wait to hear back from you!
- The Posture Killers
